name: Xinyue on Coding
tagline: a wonderland of code and life
body:
### Welcome to Xinyue's Wonderland.
Iâ€™m a sophomore CS major with a statistics minor at Bryn Mawr College, one of the seven-sisters Liberal Arts Colleges. 
I have spent the last year developing my skills as a software engineer, where I have won the Potential Impact Prize at Tri-Co Hackathon 
and developed several personal projects such as a text-based WebApp and a blog about my trip to Tibet. I have experience in Java for a year, 
Python for 6 months and JavaScript for 2 months. I am also passionate about Machine Learning and have some background in statistics and probability. 
I love programming and solving real life problems, and I am a dedicated deep-thinker and fast-learner. I will be an Engineering Practicum intern
this summer at Google.inc, and I am currently in the host-matching phase.

### My blogs
See my blogs at http://lexiexzhang.blogspot.com/

### Get in touch
Feel free to send me an email or drop me a message on Facebook if you would like to talk or connect.

*    Name: Xinyue (Lexie) Zhang
*    Address: 101 N.Merion Ave, Bryn Mawr, PA 19010
*    Email: lexiexzhang@gmail.com
*    Linkedin: [lexiexzhang@linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xinyuezhang1)
*    Facebook: [lexiexzhang@facebook](https://www.facebook.com/caroline.trujano)
